html:
Way

Description

Video from external source

Use a direct link to the video uploaded to the external source or embed code provided by external source. This way requires external domains to be added as trusted sources in the Content Security Policy section. YouTube and Vimeo domains are added out of the box.

Add a video from external source using direct link

  1. Open the Paste URL tab.
  2. Copy the link to the video from external source.
  3. Paste the link.

Add a video from external source using embed code

  1. Open the Embed code tab.
  2. Copy embed code provided by external source.
  3. Paste the code.

Video from your device

  1. Open the Paste URL tab.
  2. Drag video file or click to upload the video from your device.
